name: Liespaper
description:
A misterious tower appears in the wild, the fate of the village is in your hands.

But be careful, behaving like an hero will result in everyone hating you , since the town's newspaper only tells lies.

This game has 3 endings, be sure to replay the game to discover them all!

It is now time for some FAQs:

Q: How did you come up with the concept for the game?

A: Yes.

This ends our FAQs, enjoy the game.
